title: Олигарх-ТВ
overview: Enter the world of expensive pleasures! We will give you a tour of fabulous wealth. We will take you into closed societies and ride on luxurious yachts! Shower you with diamonds on private jets! Show you the magical world of excesses that you can only dream of. You will learn what language billionaires speak. Is it true that they eat stock market reports for breakfast and lobsters with black caviar for dinner? How many sports cars are in their fleets? And what golden palaces do financial magnates live in? Whose imagination dictates prices with six zeros and why are they willing to pay for it? Feel the money wind in your hair! Be in the place of the wealthiest people on the planet!
